description.p: zBridge is a modern, web-based implementation of the classic card game, Contract Bridge. Our goal is to provide a clean, intuitive, and enjoyable platform for players of all levels.

ul.li: Real-time Multiplayer: Play with friends or find a game in our lobby.
Bot Games: Play with Jethro, your AI bridge partner and opponent. Jethro is a sophisticated bridge bidding program.
Social & Rated Play: Choose between casual games or competitive, rated matches.
Analysis Room: Set up specific deals for analysis, practice or for composing articles. This room provides complete double dummy analysis along with bidding and play suggestions.
Modern Interface: Enjoy a clean and responsive design that works on any device. It is possible to switch between PC and mobile while in a game.
